'''Matthew Christopher Miller''', better known as '''Matthew Mercer''', is an American voice actor best known for his work in animation and video games. Within the television industry, he has provided the English voices of characters {{Wikipedia|Levi Ackerman}} from ''{{Wikipedia|Attack on Titan}}'', {{Wikipedia|Jotaro Kujo}} in ''{{Wikipedia|JoJo's Bizarre Adventure}}'', and [https://dragonball.fandom.com/wiki/Hit Hit] from ''{{Wikipedia|Dragon Ball Super}}'', among others. In the gaming industry, he has voiced characters such as {{Wikipedia|Ganondorf}} in ''{{Wikipedia|The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom}}'', {{Wikipedia|Chrom}} in ''{{Wikipedia|Fire Emblem}}'', [https://overwatch.fandom.com/wiki/Cassidy Cassidy] from ''{{Wikipedia|Overwatch}}'', {{Wikipedia|Goro Majima}} in ''{{Wikipedia|Yakuza: Like a Dragon}}'', and {{Wikipedia|Leon S. Kennedy}} from the ''{{Wikipedia|Resident Evil}}'' series.

== In the ''Minecraft'' franchise ==
In 2015, Mercer appeared as the voice of several characters within {{MCSM}}, most notably the recurring antagonist {{MCSM|Aiden}}.<ref>{{Citation|url=https://twinfinite.net/ps4/minecraft-story-mode-voice-cast/|title=Here Are the Voice Actors of the Minecraft: Story Mode Cast|author=Zak Lyons|website=Twinfinite|date=October 15, 2015}}</ref> The character initially appeared as a brief obstacle in the {{MCSM|the Order of the Stone}}, before returning as the main antagonist {{MCSM|Order Up!}} Among his other roles are the minor characters {{MCSM|Otis}}, {{MCSM|Schoolboy}}, {{MCSM|TNT Dustin}}, the {{MCSM|Old Farmer Man}}, and an unnamed griefer in {{MCSM|Boom Town}}.

== Trivia ==

* One of the characters he voices, [https://sonic.fandom.com/wiki/Espio_the_Chameleon Espio the Chameleon] from the [[Minecraft x Sonic the Hedgehog|''Sonic the Hedgehog'']] franchise, would receive a ''Minecraft'' [[skin]] in the [[Sonic the Hedgehog]] map.
** He also voiced the character [https://puyonexus.com/wiki/Ex Ex] in the game ''{{Wikipedia|Puyo Puyo Tetris}}''. An equivalent character would coincidentally appear in the [[Tetris]] map.
